name: The Study
description:
You are in a small, well kept study.  Ancient tomes are on shelves
on the walls, A huge table sits in the middle of the room, with maps
weighted down upon it.  The only light source here comes from an
interestingly non-magical oil lamp.
   The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

exits.keywords: door glass~ 1 -1 2566 S #2568 Below The Stairs~    You are at the end of a long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.  A lesser guardian is here keeping silent watch on the entrance to the levels above.    Stairs lead up and the hallway continues back south.
